org.streaminer.stream.frequency

Class SimpleTopKCounting<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.frequency.BaseFrequency<T>
      • org.streaminer.stream.frequency.SimpleTopKCounting<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseFrequency<T>, IRichFrequency<T>, ISimpleFrequency<T>

    public class SimpleTopKCounting<T>
extends BaseFrequency<T>
    This is a simple implementation of a stream-counting model. The model is updatable and will - for a given threshold k - approximate the counts of the top-k elements within a example-set/stream.
    Author:
    Christian Bockermann <christian.bockermann@udo.edu>

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleTopKCounting

        public SimpleTopKCounting(int k)
        This initially creates a counting model for streams. The model will not use more than the last k elements in order to approximate the item counts within the stream.
        Parameters:
        k - The maximum number of items that may be tracked/monitored by the model.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(T item,
          long incrementCount)
            throws FrequencyException
        This method actually does all the work when learning from the stream. It will update the inner structures to reflect the incoporation of the given example.

        incrementCount -
        Returns:
        Throws:
